name: Apollo
title: God of the Sun, Music, Poetry, Prophecy & Healing
description: Apollo is the radiant god of sunlight, music, poetry, prophecy, and healing. Twin brother of Artemis, he represents order, beauty, enlightenment, and purity. Patron of creativity, clarity, beauty, and harmony. His divine lyre brings harmony, his light brings clarity, and his prophecies guide seekers toward truth. Known for his intelligence, artistic nature, and emotional balance. He is calm but powerful—a perfect mix of light, elegance, and wisdom.
symbols: Sun chariot pulled by 4 fiery horses
